title: Pfaffia glomerata
text: Pfaffia glomerata is a <a href="medicinal%20plant">medicinal plant</a> native to <a href="Argentina">Argentina</a>, <a href="Bolivia">Bolivia</a>, <a href="Cerrado">Cerrado</a>, and <a href="Pantanal">Pantanal</a> <a href="vegetation">vegetation</a> in <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a>.
